data.title: Pacific Medical Group
data.meta_description: Pacific Medical Group is a diverse team of physicians, nurse practitioners, and physical therapists who provide a broad range of health services for our patient communities.
data.meta_site_name: Pacific Medical Group | A Praxis Health Clinic
data.text:
Dr. Michael Espino is a Southern California-born, board-certified family medicine physician. He earned his Bachelor of Science in Biology from the University of California, Irvine, and went on to receive his Doctor of Medicine degree from the University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center in the Philippines. Dr. Espino completed his residency training in family medicine at the University of Houston.

Dr. Espino’s clinical philosophy revolves around preventive care, chronic disease management, and health education. He believes in empowering his patients to take an active role in their own health and wellness by providing them with the tools and education necessary to make informed decisions about their care. He takes pride in taking the time to listen to his patients, understand their unique health concerns and healthcare barriers, and collaboratively develop personalized treatment plans that fit their lifestyles, goals, and means.

Patients appreciate Dr. Espino’s warm and approachable demeanor, as well as his ability to explain complex medical issues in a way that is easy to understand. They trust him to help them achieve their best possible health outcomes.

When he’s not working, Dr. Espino enjoys spending time exploring new restaurants, cooking new recipes, and staying active through dragon boat paddling. He is also committed to giving back to his community and is very excited to be practicing at the Tigard Clinic.
